events.title: C++ Bootcamp 3.0
events.description: A 3-day immersive bootcamp organized by GFG and CodeChef focusing on core C++ concepts with interactive sessions, coding activities, and Q&A with experts.
events.speakers: Aryan Goli, Akshay Patra, Nikhil Parbat, Akshada Pathak, Divit Jain, Dadasaheb Bhosure

events.title: Codegenesis – A Beginner’s Journey to Coding
events.description: A department-level event equipping beginners with essential tools and techniques for competitive programming through real-world examples and hands-on practice.

events.title: AI Odyssey
events.description: A hands-on 3-day AI workshop covering cutting-edge technologies including Generative AI, RAG, and AI Agent development. 3 days, 3 projects.
events.prerequisites: Basic knowledge of Python or AI concepts is helpful
